com.automatak.dnp3

Interface DNP3Manager


  • public interface DNP3Manager
    The main entry point for all dnp3 applications. Use this object to create communication channels to which you can then add masters and outstations. To obtain a concrete implementation of this interface, use the DNP3ManagerFactory class in the impl package.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLogSubscriber(LogSubscriber sub)
      Subscribe to all log messages

    • Method Detail

      • addTCPClient

        Channel addTCPClient(String id,
                   LogLevel level,
                   long retryMs,
                   String address,
                   int port)
        Add a TCP client channel. The channel does not try to connect until you add a stack.
        Parameters:
        id - An id used for logging purposes
        level - The starting level for logging output
        retryMs - The number of milliseconds in between connection attempts
        address - The address of remote host as a INET address i.e. "127.0.0.1" or name "www.google.com"
        port - The port to make the connection on. Note that only the range 0 to 65535 is valid
        Returns:
        A channel interface

      • addTCPServer

        Channel addTCPServer(String id,
                   LogLevel level,
                   long retryMs,
                   String endpoint,
                   int port)
        Add a TCP server channel. The channel does not try to listen for a connection until you add a stack.
        Parameters:
        id - An id used for logging purposes
        level - The starting level for logging output
        retryMs - The number of milliseconds in between connection attempts (in the case of a bind failure)
        endpoint - The address that identifies the network adapter to bind i.e. "127.0.0.1" or "0.0.0.0"
        port - The port to listen on. Note that only the range 0 to 65535 is valid
        Returns:
        A channel interface

      • addSerial

        Channel addSerial(String id,
                LogLevel level,
                long retryMs,
                SerialSettings settings)
        Add a serial communication channel. The channel does not try to open the port until a add a stack
        Parameters:
        id - An id used for logging purposes
        level - The starting level for logging output
        retryMs - The number of milliseconds in between open attempts (in the case of an open failure)
        settings - Settings class that specifies and configures the port
        Returns:
        A channel interface

      • addLogSubscriber

        void addLogSubscriber(LogSubscriber sub)
        Subscribe to all log messages
        Parameters:
        sub - An interface with which to listen

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Permanently shutdown all channels and any sub-objects (stacks, etc)
